e="preserve">Perrance Shiri (born Bigboy Samson Chikerema on 11 January 1955 – 29 July 2020) Zimbabwean air officer and government official. He was Minister of Lands, Agriculture and Rural Resettlement in the Cabinet of Zimbabwe from 1 December 2017 until his death in 2020. He was the commander of the Air Force of Zimbabwe and member of the Joint Operations Command.
Shiri was a cousin of former President Robert Mugabe. He called himself "Black Jesus".
Shiri died on 28 July 2020 from COVID-19 while hospitalized in Harare, aged 65.
